text: Thomas Meunier (born 12 September 1991) is a Belgian football player. He plays as a right-back for Borussia Dortmund and the Belgium national team. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Belgian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from Luxembourg (Belgium) Category:Living people Category:Borussia Dortmund players
title: Thomas Meunier
